channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-1622] Expose Tika LanguageIdentifier via Tika Server
item.description: The LanguageIdentifier in Tika should be exposed via Tika JAX-RS.
item.summary: Expose Tika LanguageIdentifier via Tika Server

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Checked in with test cases!

commit -m "- fix for TIKA-1622 Expose Tika LanguageIdentifier via Tika Server" /Users/mattmann/src/tika-server/src/test/resources/english.txt /Users/mattmann/src/tika-server/src/test/java/org/apache/tika/server/LanguageResourceTest.java /Users/mattmann/src/tika-server/src/main/java/org/apache/tika/server/resource/LanguageResource.java /Users/mattmann/src/tika-server/src/test/resources/french.txt

Sending        CHANGES.txt
Transmitting file data .
Committed revision 1677718.
[chipotle:~/tmp/tika] mattmann%

I'll now update http://github.com/chrismattmann/tika-python/ to support language identification. Next is translation!

SUCCESS: Integrated in tika-trunk-jdk1.7 #668 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/tika-trunk-jdk1.7/668/)

  • fix for TIKA-1622 Expose Tika LanguageIdentifier via Tika Server (mattmann: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1677720)
  • /tika/trunk/tika-server/pom.xml
  • fix for TIKA-1622 Expose Tika LanguageIdentifier via Tika Server (mattmann: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1677719)

    fix for TIKA-1622 Expose Tika LanguageIdentifier via Tika Server (mattmann: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/tika/trunk/?view=rev&rev=1677718)

  • /tika/trunk/tika-server/src/test/resources/french.txt

A very minor observation to chrismattmann: the french sentence is incorrect. There is no cedilla in the c in front of the 'i', in french; but it's needed in front of the 'a'. The sentence should be: "comme ci comme ça". Many thanks for the great job

Thank you tledoux for the correction! Would you be willing to submit and attach a patch or to make a pull request? Instructions are here: http://github.com/apache/tika/#contributing would be very happy to update it!
ping tledoux would you like to submit a minor patch to fix this?
Hi, here is the trivial patch. Hope it applies.
Thank you tledoux going to commit this now. Thank you!

hi tledoux so I tried the patch out, and for whatever reason, Tika's language identifier detects the corrected french sentence as italian, and thus fails the unit test. Sigh. FYI this:

-------------------------------------------------------
 T E S T S
-------------------------------------------------------
Running org.apache.tika.server.DetectorResourceTest
Tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 1.774 sec - in org.apache.tika.server.DetectorResourceTest
Running org.apache.tika.server.LanguageResourceTest
Tests run: 4, Failures: 2, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 0.277 sec <<< FAILURE! - in org.apache.tika.server.LanguageResourceTest
testDetectFrenchString(org.apache.tika.server.LanguageResourceTest)  Time elapsed: 0.048 sec  <<< FAILURE!
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[fr]> but was:<[it]>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:144)
	at org.apache.tika.server.LanguageResourceTest.testDetectFrenchString(LanguageResourceTest.java:82)

testDetectFrenchFile(org.apache.tika.server.LanguageResourceTest)  Time elapsed: 0.031 sec  <<< FAILURE!
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[fr]> but was:<[it]>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:144)
	at org.apache.tika.server.LanguageResourceTest.testDetectFrenchFile(LanguageResourceTest.java:106)

Apologies for not testing my first patch.
I suppose the confusion comes for the italian 'come ci'. Nevertheless, giving a like more context does work.
So here is a second patch for that, that do work ...
